mapper.select: select m.name, r.r_name, g.g_name from member m , grade r, groups g where m.rank = r.rank and m.depart = g.groupid and m.id=#{id}
select m.name, g.r_name, c.c_name as g_name from member m , grade g, companies c where m.rank = g.rank and m.depart = c.company and m.id=#{id}
select m.name, g.g_name, c.c_name, r.r_name from member m left join groups g on m.depart = g.groupid join companies c on m.company = c.company left join grade r on m.rank = r.rank
select g_name from groups where company=#{company} and group_rank=1
